constituent: surpass, run, soil, dirt, ground, mend, parade
heisigStory: Here we see two parades in competition, each trying to surpass the other by running at high speed from one town to the next. Note the little "hook" at the end of the first stroke of the element for parade. This is the ONLY time it appears like this in the kanji treated in this book.
koohiiStory1: The person in charge of running the parade surpassed all our expectations (by just a extra drop...).
koohiiStory2: The parade of runners are all trying to SURPASS each other - and they end up running all the way to Vietnam (note that this kanji is also used for the country of Vietnam).
kunYomi: こ.す、-こ.す、-ご.し、こ.える、-ご.え
myStory: vượt qua. chạy như rồng bay nên vượt qua.
readingExamples: 越える (こ.える), 越す (こ.す)
words: to cross over, to cross, to pass through, to pass over (out of)
